TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of infections caused by herpesvirus, including herpes-zoster (shingles). It belongs to the family of drugs called antivirals.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para tratar las infecciones causadas por el virus del herpes, incluso el herpes zóster (culebrilla). Es un tipo de antivírico.
